title: Give me my LP back?
body: Literally my whole team of 5 man flex got disconnected from the game right after we got baron we all live relatively close but I dont think it was the power or anything like that because our discord call still worked and we were talking. (edit) forgot to talk about the game we ended up loseing they just killed our base, but it was unfair because we all connected back into the game when our baron timer was 1/3rd out, its dumb to count this as a loss.

replies.body: That's a weird situation, I haven't seen any reports of games crashing like this.  Were you a full team possibly on the same network?  Your local network or ISP could have had a hiccup in that case.  We aren't able to alter ranked stats, still, sorry to hear that happened!
